buildCommand: echo "⚠️ dashboard project is disabled; enable intentionally before deploying." && cd ../.. && pnpm exec prisma generate --schema=packages/db/prisma/schema.prisma && pnpm exec prisma generate --schema=apps/dashboard/prisma/schema.prisma && pnpm turbo run build --filter=@mindware-blog/dashboard...
installCommand: echo "Using workspace PNPM; keep root deploy active." && pnpm install --frozen-lockfile
